ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: SpSporeViability
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: These are spore viability data for individual Saccharomyces paradoxus strains, as well as crosses between them. There are numerous columns with different identifiers (genetic group, strain, within/between population, etc.) for different analyses.
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:subject: Mate choice
Mating systems
Speciation: reinforcement
Fungi
